Name: Weihnachtslieder von Komponistinnen Band 3
Notes: Collection of Christmas songs by female composers from America, Germany, England, France, and the Netherlands
Long Description: This volume includes works by Muriel Herbert, Catharina van Rennes, Sibylle Mertens-Schaaffhausen, Fanny Hensel, Emilie Zumsteeg, Lili Boulanger, Amy Marcy Beach, Annette von Droste-HÃ¼lshoff, Rebecca Clarke, and Elizabeth Poston. The collection features a variety of Christmas songs and lieder for mezzo soprano and piano.
Short Description: Collection of Christmas songs by female composers for mezzo soprano and piano
